text: Gustavo José Joaquín Noboa Bejarano (21 August 1937 – 16 February 2021) was an Ecuadorian politician. He was the 42nd President of Ecuador from 22 January 2000 to 15 January 2003. Before, he was the Vice President during Jamil Mahuad's government from 1998 to 2000. Noboa was born on 21 August 1937 in Guayaquil, Ecuador. He was married to María Isabel Baquerizo. In March 2006, Noboa was put under house arrest for mishandling Ecuador's foreign debt."Ecuador's ex-President Gustavo Noboa released from house arrest", The Associated Press, March 17, 2006 Noboa died at a hospital in Miami, Florida from a heart attack while having brain cancer surgery on 16 February 2021, aged 83."Murió el expresidente Gustavo Noboa", El Universo, February 16, 2021 ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Guayaquil Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Deaths from surgical complications
